name: Margherita Pizza
description: A classic Italian pizza made with a thin, crispy crust topped with fresh mozzarella cheese, flavorful tomato sauce, and aromatic basil leaves. Perfect for those who love simplicity and fresh ingredients.

name: Caesar Salad
description: A refreshing salad made with crisp romaine lettuce, creamy Caesar dressing, crunchy croutons, and freshly grated Parmesan cheese. Often served with an optional topping of grilled chicken or shrimp.

name: Grilled Chicken Burger
description: Juicy grilled chicken fillet served in a soft bun with crisp lettuce, ripe tomatoes, and a creamy mayo sauce. A perfect choice for a light yet flavorful meal.

name: Beef Steak
description: Tender, juicy beef steak seasoned and grilled to perfection, served with creamy mashed potatoes and saut√©ed vegetables. A hearty and satisfying dish for meat lovers.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: A creamy pasta dish made with perfectly cooked spaghetti, crispy bacon bits, Parmesan cheese, and a touch of garlic. Finished with a sprinkle of black pepper for added flavor.

name: Butter Chicken
description: A rich and creamy curry made with marinated chicken cooked in a velvety tomato-based sauce. Served with naan bread or steamed rice for a complete meal.

name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
description: A vibrant mix of fresh vegetables stir-fried in a savory soy-based sauce with a hint of garlic and ginger. Served with a side of steamed rice or noodles.

name: Sushi Platter
description: An assortment of sushi rolls filled with fresh fish, vinegared rice, and seaweed. Served with pickled ginger, wasabi, and soy sauce for a delightful Japanese experience.

name: Cheeseburger
description: A classic burger with a juicy beef patty, melted cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato, onions, and a tangy special sauce. Served in a toasted sesame bun.

name: Tandoori Chicken
description: Chicken marinated in yogurt and spices, then grilled in a tandoor for a smoky flavor. Served with a side of mint chutney and fresh salad.

name: Seafood Paella
description: A traditional Spanish dish made with saffron-infused rice, shrimp, mussels, and a mix of fresh seafood. A flavorful one-pot meal perfect for sharing.

name: Chocolate Lava Cake
description: A rich, gooey chocolate cake with a molten chocolate center. Served warm with a scoop of vanilla ice cream for a perfect dessert experience.
